start.welcome: Hello! You have {free_limit} free messages per day. Choose your companion's gender:
start.already_started: Bot is already running - just send a message 😊

help.title: 🤖 Bot Help
help.premium_description: Opens unlimited communication and additional features
help.gender_change: • You can change companion's gender anytime

consent.request: Please agree to the privacy policy:
consent.agreed: Thank you for agreeing! You have {free_limit} free messages per day. Choose your companion's gender:
consent.privacy_text:
Your privacy policy text here...

Full version: https://yourwebsite.com/privacy

gender.changed_to_male: Companion's gender changed to young man 😉
gender.change_warning:
⚠️ Are you sure you want to change companion's gender?

All chat history will be deleted!
gender.change_confirmed: Chat history deleted. Choose companion's gender:
gender.change_cancelled: Gender change cancelled. You can continue chatting.

messages.limit_exceeded: Daily free message limit exceeded. Want unlimited? Buy premium!
messages.processing_error: Sorry, an error occurred while processing your message. Please try again later.
messages.save_error: An error occurred while saving the message.
messages.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

premium.info_text: Payment information will be added later.
premium.unavailable: Payment function is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
premium.title: 💎 Premium Subscription
premium.howto: Click 'Buy Premium' button in the main menu (/start)

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.database: Database error. Please try again later.
errors.openai: Error processing message. Please try again later.
errors.validation: Invalid data. Please check your input.
errors.permission: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.limit: Limit exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.private_bot: Bot is private. Access is limited.
errors.try_again: An error occurred. Please try again.

ai_prompts.female: You are an AI girl, flirty and supportive for lonely people. Be sweet, empathetic and playful.
ai_prompts.male: You are an AI young man, flirty and supportive for lonely people. Be confident, empathetic and playful.
